name: Hammered Red Brass & Azurite Malachite Earrings
description:
This pair of earrings was made with red brass, round Czech glass coin beads, and rondelles of azurite malachite.

The red brass "washers" were punched with a disc cutter, filed, sanded, and hammered.  I then drilled and domed them.

The ear wires are made with red brass wire and were lightly hammered for shape retention and tumble polished.

The finished earrings were antiqued and hand polished.

All metal is red brass (85% copper & 15% zinc)

Approximate total length of earrings:  2 1/8 inches or 5.4 cm

Approximate dangle length: 1 5/8 inches or 4.1 cm

name: Crab Agate, Carnelian, & White Stone Sterling Silver Necklace & Earrings
description:
This rosary wrapped necklace features an oval crab agate focal bead and four additional bicone-shaped crab agate beads.  The necklace is completed with coordinating carnelian, white stone, and geometric Bali sterling silver beads all accented with simple Bali sterling silver bead caps.  There is a Bali sterling silver angelfish charm attached to the lobster clasp for added interest.

Coordinating earrings feature Bali sterling silver cube beads, Thai Hill Tribe silver tube beads, and small round carnelian beads all hanging from oval handmade sterling silver hoops.

All metal is either sterling silver (92.5%) or Thai Hill Tribe Silver (97-99%).

The necklace is approximately 26.5 inches or 67.3 cm long.
Earrings are approximately 1.25 inches or 3.2 cm long.

name: Green Kazuri Bead & Copper Long Dangle Earrings
description:
My handmade hammered copper bead caps top speckled green Kazuri beads.  Faceted Czech glass beads and tiny copper beads also add interest hanging beneath the copper spirals.

Earrings were treated with liver of sulphur and hand polished to attain an antiqued patina.

Kazuri beads are handmade in Kenya and are fairly traded. (Fair Trade Federation)
A leaflet about Kazuri beads will be included with your purchase.

Earrings are approximately 2.75 inches or 7 cm long.

name: Freshwater Pearl & Kazuri Bead Necklace with Matching Earrings
description:
This asymetrical necklace features grayish lavender freshwater pearls and Kazuri beads.  The necklace has a Bali sterling silver bird link that is offset from the center and all Kazuri beads are accented by sterling silver bead caps.  The necklace is finished with a flowering vine Bali sterling silver toggle clasp.

The necklace is strung on 49-strand nylon coated stainless steel beading wire and finished with sterling silver crimping beads, crimping bead covers, and wire guardians.

The matching earrings feature the same Kazuri beads and Bali sterling silver bead caps.  Handmade ear wires were made using 20 gauge sterling silver wire.

The necklace is approximately 20.5 inches or 52.1 cm long.
The earrings hang approximately 1.5 inches or 3.8 cm long.

Kazuri beads are handmade in Kenya are are fairly traded.
A leaflet about the story behind Kazuri beads will be included with your purchase.
